text:
log4j 1.3 defined a component model with classes such as Component, ComponentBase, Plugin, 
PluginRegistry etc that were used both by log4j 1.3 and chainsaw.  This enhancement packages those 
classes to support hosting Chainsaw on log4j 1.2.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
Should be functional at this writing.  Source can be checked out from:

svn co https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/sandbox/log4j/component
